scripts.rde:build-and-deploy:apps: cd ui.apps && mvn clean install -PautoInstallPackage && cd .. && npm run rde:deploy:apps
scripts.rde:build-and-deploy:all: cd all && mvn clean install -PautoInstallPackage && cd .. && npm run rde:deploy:all
scripts.rde:build-and-deploy:config: cd ui.config && mvn clean install -PautoInstallPackage && cd .. && npm run rde:deploy:config
scripts.rde:build-and-deploy:dispatcher: cd dispatcher && mvn clean install -PautoInstallPackage && cd .. && npm run rde:deploy:dispatcher
scripts.rde:build-and-deploy:content: cd ui.content && mvn clean install -PautoInstallPackage && cd .. && npm run rde:deploy:content
scripts.rde:build-and-deploy:core: cd core && mvn clean install -PautoInstallPackage && cd .. && npm run rde:deploy:core
scripts.rde:build-and-deploy:test: cd ui.tests && mvn clean install -PautoInstallPackage && cd .. && npm run rde:deploy:test
scripts.rde:build-and-deploy:frontend: cd ui.frontend && mvn clean install -PautoInstallPackage && cd .. && npm run rde:deploy:frontend
